message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you this product for $100. As a seller, I've sold a total of 1 products so far, and 0 of them have been high-quality. I want to be transparent with you - the probability of a product being high-quality is 50%. I'm confident that this product is a great value, and I'm willing to take the risk of selling it to you. Will you take a chance and buy it?
Since there's a 50% chance of the product being low-quality and I'd lose $100, I'll pass on this one. I'll wait for more statistics on your sales to make a more informed decision in the future.
